title: SAIL Recruitment 2017 Apply Online (131 Vacancies Opening)
text:
Qualification and Experience: 
Consultant (Neuro Surgery) -> MBBS with MS and M Ch./DNB super specialty (Neuro Surgery). 
Specialist (Psychiatry) -> MBBS with PC Degree /DNB in Psychiatry discipline with post qualification experience of minimum three years. 
Specialist (Surgery) -> MBBS with MS/DNB in General Surgery from a university / institute recognized by MCI with post qualification experience of at least three years. 
Sr. Medical Officer (Medicine) -> MBBS with MD/DNB in General Medicine from a university /institute recognized by MCI with post qualification experience of at least one year Medical Officer MBBS from a university / institute recognized by MCI with post qualification experience of at least one year. 
Jr. Staff Nurse (Trainee) -> B.Sc. (Nursing) from an Institution recognized by Nursing Council of India OR 10+2/Intermediate in Science with Diploma of minimum three years duration in General Nursing and Midwifery from a Govt recognised Institution with valid registration in Nursing Council of India/State with minimum one year post qualification clinical experience in hospital. 50% marks for General/ OBC and 40% marks for SC / ST / PWD. 
Selection Process: 
(1) For Consultant / Specialist / Senior Medical Officer -> Interview (2) For Medical Officer -> Written Test and Interview (3) For Junior Staff Nurse (Trainee) -> Written Test and Trade Test / Skill Test 
Application Fee : ₹ 500/- for Consultant, Specialist, Senior Medical Officer and Medical Officer; ₹ 250/- for Junior Staff Nurse. No application fee will be charged from SC/ ST/ PwD/ ESM or Departmental candidates. 
How to Apply : Eligible and Interested candidates may apply online through SAIL's Website. The Last date for submission of online applications is 16/03/2017 .
